jcr:content.jcr:title: List of cities and towns in Guyana

contentheadline.headline: List of cities and towns in Guyana

contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Gy-map.png|thumb|250px|Map of Guyana]] [[File:St George's Cathedral.jpg|thumb|right|250px|[[Georgetown, Guyana|Georgetown]], Capital of Guyana]] [[File:Bartica.gif|thumb|right|250px|[[Bartica]]]] This is a '''list of settlements in [[Guyana]]'''. The following definitions have been used: *'''City''': Any settlement listed at <ref name="WG">[http://world-gazetteer.com/wg.php?x=&men=gcis&lng=en&des=wg&srt=npan&col=abcdefghinoq&msz=1500&geo=-96 World Gazetteer, Guyana: Largest cities and towns with statistics of their population]</ref> that had a 2009 population estimated of 75,000 or more. *'''Town''': As given at <ref name="WG"/> plus any other settlements with a 2009 population estimate of between 750 and 75,000. *'''Village''' Any settlement not listed at <ref name="WG"/> and with a 2009 population estimate of less than 750. *'''Community''': Any settlement not listed at <ref name="WG"/> and which Google Maps satellite view shows is too small to be a village. *'''Neighbourhood''': Geographically obvious subdivisions of any of the above. *'''Estate''': Contiguous agricultural holding that is notable enough to have a Wikipedia article. *'''Mission''': Any such that is notable enough to have a Wikipedia article. {{Expand list|date=November 2009}} ==Cities== *[[Georgetown, Guyana|Georgetown]] - Capital ==Towns== {{colbegin|3}} *[[Anna Regina]] *[[Georgetown, Guyana|Georgetown]] *[[Corriverton]] *[[Linden, Guyana|Linden]] *[[New Amsterdam, Guyana|New Amsterdam]] *[[Rose Hall, Guyana]] {{colend}} ==Villages== {{colbegin|4}} *[[Adventure, Guyana|Adventure]] *[[Aishalton]] *[[Annai]] *[[Ann's Grove]] *[[Apoteri]] *[[Arakaka]] *[[Arimu Mine]] *[[Baramita]] *[[Biloku]] *[[Blairmont]] *[[Burma, Guyana|Burma]] *[[Bush lot, Guyana|Bush lot, West Coast Berbice]] *[[Buxton, Guyana|Buxton]] *[[Berbice]] *[[Black Bush]] *[[Charity, Guyana|Charity]] *[[Chateau Margot, East Coast Demerara]] *[[Enmore, Guyana|Enmore]] *[[Enterprise, Guyana|Enterprise]] *[[Everton, Guyana|Everton]] *[[Fort Washington, Guyana|Fort Washington]] *[[Golden Grove, Guyana]] *[[Good Hope, Guyana|Good Hope]] *[[Great Diamond]] *[[Helena, Guyana|Helena]] *[[Holmia, Guyana|Holmia]] *[[Hope, Guyana|Hope]] *[[Hosororo]] *[[Hyde Park, Guyana|Hyde Park]] *[[Imbaimadai]] *[[Isherton]] *[[Issano]] *[[Isseneru]] *[[Kalkuni, Guyana|Kalkuni]] *[[Kamarang]] *[[Kamikusa]] *[[Kangaruma]] *[[Kartuni]] *[[Keweigek]] *[[Koriabo]] *[[Kurupakari]] *[[Kwakwani]] *[[La Grance, Guyana|La Grange]] *[[Leonora, Guyana|Leonora]] *[[Le Ressouvenir, East Coast Demerara]] *[[Mabaruma]] *[[Mabura]] *[[Mahdia, Guyana|Mahdia]] *[[Makouria, Guyana|Makouria]] *[[Mara, Guyana|Mara]] *[[Matthew's Ridge]] *[[Morawhanna]] *[[Moruca]] *[[New Found Out]] *[[Non Pariel]] *[[Orealla, Guyana|Orealla]] *[[Orinduik]] *[[Parika]] *[[Peters Mine]] *[[Pickersgill]] *[[Port Kaituma]] *[[Port Mourant]] *[[Potaro Landing]] *[[Rewa, Guyana|Rewa]] *[[Rockstone]] *[[Rose Hall, Guyana|Rose Hall]] *[[Saveretik]] *[[Schoon Ord]] *[[Spring Garden, Guyana|Spring Garden]] *[[St. Cuthbert's Mission, Guyana|St. Cuthbert's Mission]] *[[Success Housing Scheme, East Coast Demerara]] *[[Suddie]] *[[Surama]] *[[Takama]] *[[Three Friends, Guyana|Three
